items.title: When, where, and how to watch Notre Dame VS Texas A&M
items.summary: Are you looking for a college football season restart? In a lot of ways, this game between Notre Dame and Texas A&M is very much like resetting the game console. There’s no way to erase the loss to Miami, but many of the questions that arose from it could be vanquished with a better performance […]

items.title: 2025 NotreDame Football: Irish VS Texas A&M
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irisb are looking to bounce back in a big way this week as they play host to the Texas A&M Aggies. The Irish are staring the season in a weird way — the Sunday game against Miami followed by the short week bye. In the game against Miami, Notre Dame showed […]

items.title: Notre Dame VS Texas A&M: Weather Report
items.summary: The 16th ranked Texas A&M Aggies travel to South Bend to take on the 8th ranked Notre Dame Fighting Irish in a Top 25 showdown that is going to be one of the biggest games of the college football weekend. It’s Notre Dame’s home opener, and fans are ready to get up to the House […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 2 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame had an early bye week and sat at home during week 2 of the college football season. All 12 of their opponents, however, were in action. The schedule went 10-2 for the week and now has an overall record of 19-3. Despite only two teams being currently ranked, we could see as many […]

items.title: Notre Dame moves up one spot in the AP Top 25 and Coaches Poll to #8
items.summary: I tried very hard, and successfully, to avoid using the phrase, “Cheeseburger Bye Week” all last week because it wasn’t a typical bye week — nor was it the definition of a cheeseburger bye week either. I was wrong. While Notre Dame was at home eating cheeseburgers on Saturday, the rest of the college football […]

items.title: College Football Week 2: Game Thread
items.summary: Nothing fancy to say today as we sit on the early Notre Dame bye week. Below is the game thread for all of the action today. There’s not a lot of big games, but… that could mean there might be a blood week brewing. Have fun!

items.title: College Football Week 2 could be sneaky good: Staff Picks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are off this week — hopefully fixing all of the issues that surfaced in the loss to Miami on Sunday. The rest of the college football world, however, is playing games this week. It’s an unusually bad week as far as matchups are concerned, but in the past, we’ve seen […]
